item.description:
Let's meetup over dinner before the Atlas Soul show, to get some time for food, drinks, and conversation with the Boston Culture Club Meetup Group.

A ticket purchase for the Regattabar, gives you a 10% discount (food and non-alcoholic drinks) at Henrietta's Table (in the same building). So let's meet up there for dinner!

Info:
http://www.henriettastable.com

As this is a dinner meetup, I need to be exact with numbers for the reservation, so please only RSVP yes if you are definitely going to be at the restaurant at 5:30pm
item.name: Pre-Atlas Soul/Timbila dinner meetup
